attributes.action: Increase taxes on large corps and the highest earners to fund disability support
attributes.additional_details:
Disabled people face extra costs & rely on benefits; cuts cause hardship, as widely warned. Increased tax on corporations/wealthy is a just, sustainable alternative to austerity or tax reliefs for the rich. Prioritise social support fairly

https://www.theguardian.com/society/2025/mar/17/benefit-cuts-will-push-more-people-into-poverty-warns-citizens-advice-boss
https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/articles/ce8vp560n7vo
https://inews.co.uk/news/politics/tax-cut-billionaires-starmer-musk-bezos-trade-3630807
attributes.background: Instead of cutting disability support or giving corporate tax reliefs, Government should raise taxes on large company profits & highest earners. Use this revenue to secure vital disability benefits. Prioritise disabled people's needs through fair taxation, ensuring their dignity & independence.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 
 
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
